name: Queen of Swords
description:
Join Princess Boof on a dungeon-crawling adventure facing well-equipped enemies with a handful of your very own non-swords!

Face all odds as you traverse a dungeon as Princess Boof, everyone’s favorite non-sword-wielding dog princess, accompanied by nothing but the omnipresent voice of the Queen of Swords.
